animeTitle: Uta No Prince-Sama Maji Love Revolutions
otherNames: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love Revolutions, うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪マジLOVEレボリューションズ
synopsis: According to reports by the attendees of Sunday's "Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love Live 3rd Stage" event, a third anime adaptation of the otome game "Uta no☆Prince-sama♪" was announced for 2015.
